metadata.title: CVE-2021-3979 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A key length flaw was found in Red Hat Ceph Storage. An attacker canexploit the fact that the key length is incorrectly passed in an encryptionalgorithm to create a non random key, which is weaker and can be exploitedfor loss of confidentiality and integrity on encrypted disks.

criterions.comment: ceph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
